name: ChicScape
description: A miniature arcade survival game as a chicken in a poultry farm. Climb the walls making long and short jumps from left to right and from right to the left to escape from the huge blade and avoid the chicken soup. There are also dangerous obstacles on the walls that can kill the chicken with an electric shock. Move as far as possible and get a big score. Jump using just the mouse button. A short press gives a short jump, a long press gives an enhanced jump. Run away from the poultry farm.
